entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.RoutingTest.NavigationLock_CanBlockExternalNavigation` and friends #57153
  • Rate limiting middleware for AspNet/Kestrel #57152
  • Reduce error level of `blazor.web.js` does not exist errors #57149
  • Intermittent Error on Build #57147
  • Shared project files marked as content are inconsistent on debug and after being published on Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App. #57146
  • @microsoft SignalR 8.0.9. Failed to resolve module specifier "module". Relative references must start with either "/", "./", or "../" #57145
  • NullReferenceException invoking superclass method, seems "this" disappeared #57144
  • Blazor Wasm different output between build and publish #57143
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to launch SPOTClient app after retargeting it to .NET 9.0 with error: Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'PlatformHelpers.initSearchInputFocus' #57138
  • [WebToolsE2E] Run .exe/.dll file with error "An exception occurred while trying to decrypt the element." from publish folder after publishing .NET 9.0 Razor/MVC/Blazor web app project. #57137

Closed

  • Installer of aspnetcore still contains wrong outdated .NET dotnet license information that makes it problematic to distribute #54434
    9.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_dapper #57093
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #57134
  • Perf regression: json #57135
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Figure out a way to update the Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version used in project templates on a regular cadence #26619
    Backlog
  • How can I use the @rendermode InteractiveServer in the Index.cshtml file? #57113
  • Remove hard code casting #57133

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine `CanBlockExternalNavigation` and friends #57154
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • Add some comments to various internal HTTP/2 types #57151
    area-networking
  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Some of the default UI styling is not accessible in dark mode #57142
    area-blazor
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5bcb2d7` to `ff233bd` #57140
    area-infrastructure
  • Sync shared code from runtime #57136
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Propagate trace parent to SignalR hub invocations #57049
    area-signalr, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Display placeholders on form elements #57126
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] Add aria-label to provide alternative text for screen readers #57125
    area-mvc, area-blazor
  • [Blazor][Accessibility] At reflow resolution "Hamburger" control is not visible clearly #57127
    area-mvc
  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
